item.title: Book Review: The Sky is Yours by Chandler Klang Smith
item.description: The Sky is Yours by Chandler Klang Smith A sprawling, genre-defying epic set in a dystopian metropolis plagued by dragons, this debut about what itâ€™s like to be young in a very old world is pure storytelling pleasure In the burned-out, futuristic city of Empire Island, three young people navigate a crumbling metropolis constantly under threat from a pair of dragons that circle the skies.
